attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to bring back national service and help bring some respect back into the youngsters who dont respect other people and there country

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
Also similar to http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/servicenational/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
